mapper.select: SELECT m.memberNum, membership, userId, userName, nickName, enabled, userPwd, reg_date, modify_date, last_login, failure_cnt FROM member m JOIN member1 m1 ON m1.memberNum = m.memberNum WHERE userId = #{userId} AND enabled != 0
SELECT enabled FROM member m JOIN member1 m1 ON m1.memberNum = m.memberNum WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member1 SET failure_cnt = failure_cnt+1 WHERE userId=#{userId}
UPDATE member1 SET enabled = 0 WHERE userId=#{userId}
UPDATE member1 SET last_login = SYSDATE, failure_cnt = 0 WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member1(memberNum, userId, userName, nickName, userPwd, enabled, reg_date, modify_date, failure_cnt) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{userPwd}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)
INSERT INTO member2(userId, birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2) VALUES (#{userId}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO member1(memberNum, userId, userName, nickName, userPwd, enabled, reg_date, modify_date, failure_cnt) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{userPwd}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0) INTO member2(userId, birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2) VALUES (#{userId}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) SELECT * FROM dual
